column2: and the first thing you'd probably notice is the line going out the door of people waiting to order their food. It was a Saturday night
column4: and it was around a 20-30 minute wait to get your food. What is more concerning is the lack of seating in the restaurant to serve the amount of people in line
column5: but there was some outside seating and apparently a bar next door where you can sit with your food. Regardless
column6: finding a table is pretty stressful and not exactly effortless.
